creator: Lupton Apps
descriptionHtml:
Swig is the perfect drinking game to energize your party, whether is for pre-drinks or for a house party.

With over 450 unique cards, the drinks are guaranteed to flow and your guests entertained.

There are four different selectable modes:

-Walk in the Park
-Socially Invasive
-Socially Unacceptable
-Pandoras Box

'Walk in the Park' is perfect for breaking the ice while Pandors Box can only be recommended for the party animals amongst us.

Each mode has a balance of different cards, including:

-Never have I ever
-Dare
-Drink
-Interrogation
-Challenge
-Humiliation
-Vote

The forfeit for each drinking card is shown at the bottom of each card:

beer icon = 1 sip
tequila icon: = 1 shot
descriptionShort: A drinking game with 7 different card types and over 450 unique cards.

title: Swig - The Drinking Game

creator: Lupton Apps
descriptionHtml:
Swig – Drinking Games (Truth or Drink) is one of the newest truth or drink / drinking games to hit 2021.

Unlike other drinking games, the balance of questions has been carefully considered to maximize the gaming experience. You'll find no social media questions here!

Like other drinking games, Swig aims to uncover the truth and humiliate all players equally at all costs!

Swig – Drinking Games (Truth or Drink) combines popular drinking game themes such as truth or dare, never have I ever and would you rather into one consolidated drinking game medium.

There are over 500 drinking game cards over 4 different modes.

Swig is a free drinking games though the bottom 3 modes are only available via an in app purchase:

-Walk in the Park
-Socially Invasive
-Socially Unacceptable and
-Pandora’s Box

Pandora’s box is pretty rogue and may be considered as the dirty drinking games mode where as Walk in the Park is pretty tame.

Walk in the Park is almost suitable to play with work colleagues so is perfect if you are looking for an easy drinking game to play for a bachelorette party.

The forfeit for each drinking game card is shown at the bottom of each drinking card:

🍺 beer icon = 1 sip
tequila icon: = 1 shot

If you are wondering why most drinking game store listings look like they have been written by a drunk potato, then its mostly because they are trying to spam the description with key words such as dirty drinking games, truth or drink, do or drink, drunk games, truth or dare, drunk games, free drinking games etc for aso purposes.

Anyway, I digress. The 7 different drinking cards in the game are as follows:

-Drink
-Never have I ever
-Interrogation (truth or drink)
-God Mode
-Vote (would you rather)
-Dare (do or drink)
-Challenge (players are pitted against each other)

Interestingly Swig was born out of my housemates paying for Piccolo. Swig has none of those lame social media questions and you can even go back to a previous question.

If you are particularly passionate about the lack of a particular drinking question or option, then feel free to email me and I will consider adding it in.

So give Swig – Drinking Games (Truth or Drink) a go and install now!
descriptionShort: Drinking games including truth or drink, never have I ever etc...

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Corrected spelling mistake in new questions

title: Swig –Drinking Games (Truth or Drink)

creator: Lupton Apps
descriptionHtml:
Swig – The Drinking Game combines popular drinking games such as never have I ever, do or drink, would you rather, truth or drink, drink or tell into one medium.

Swig is a card based drinking game for 2 or more players with over 550 drinking game cards.

The 7 types of drinking cards in the game are as follows:

-Drink
-Never have I ever
-Interrogation (truth or drink/drink or tell)
-God Mode
-Vote (would you rather)
-Dare (do or drink)
-Challenge (players are pitted against each other)

The forfeit for each drinking game card is shown at the bottom of each drinking card:

🍺 beer icon = 1 sip
tequila icon: = 1 shot

The four drinking game modes are as following:

-Walk in the Park
-Socially Invasive
-Socially Unacceptable and
-Pandora’s Box

Walk in the Park is almost suitable to play with work colleagues so is perfect if you are looking for an easy drinking game to play for a bachelorette party.
However as you go down the list of the other drinking game modes, the questions become more personal, the odds are higher and you are more likely to end up as a drunk potato!

While Swig - The Drinking Game is a free drinking game, only the Walk in the Park Mode can be accessed without in app purchases.

Interestingly Swig was born out of my housemates paying for Piccolo. Swig - The Drinking Game has none of those lame social media questions and you can even go back to the previous question :)

If you are particularly passionate about the lack of a particular drinking game question or option, then feel free to email me and I will consider adding it in. My goal is to make Swig - The Drinking game one of the most fun drinking games available.

So give Swig – The Drinking Game a go and install now! Only together can we make Swig- The Drinking Game the number 1 drinking games for adults.
descriptionShort: A card based drinking game for adults with over 550 drinking game cards
